/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by lush green trees on one side and towering buildings on the other. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few wispy clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
